column8: June 23 from 6:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. at Irvin Macz Funeral Home in Centralia. Celebration of Life Services will be held on Wednesday
column9: June 24 at 11:00 a.m. at Irvin Macz Funeral Home in Centralia with Pastor Paul Mount and Dave Starr officiating and military funeral honors by the Centralia VFW Post 2055 and the American Legion Post 446.
